text: Colleen Denney is a professor of gender and women's studies at the University of Wyoming.Colleen Denney. University of Wyoming. Retrieved 22 May 2015. She is a specialist in British women artists of the Victorian era. Denney's The Grosvenor Gallery: A Palace of Art in Victorian England (1996) was the first detailed study of the Grosvenor Gallery.The Grosvenor Gallery A Palace of Art in Victorian England. Yale University Press. Retrieved 22 May 2015. ==Selected publications== *The Grosvenor Gallery: A Palace of Art in Victorian England. Yale University Press, New Haven, 1996. (With Susan P. Casteras) *At the temple of art: the Grosvenor Gallery, 1877-1890. Madison, Fairleigh Dickinson University Press, 2000. *Representing Diana, Princess of Wales : cultural memory and fairy tales revisited. Madison, Fairleigh Dickinson University Press, 2005. *Women, portraiture and the crisis of identity in Victorian England: My lady scandalous reconsidered. Farnham, Ashgate, 2009. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:University of Minnesota alumni Category:University of Wyoming faculty Category:Louisiana State University alumni Category:American art historians
title: Colleen Denney
